name: notifications
description: Week 3 - Express Notifications Create an application, of which every time a new user connects to our server, everyone else connected via sockets will be notified of that person's arrival with the following message: "Socket ID MV72_Ja_oKBrFlqyAAAG joined us!" , as well as notified of their exit from the server with the following message: "Socket ID MV72_Ja_oKBrFlqyAAAG left us!".
author: Polly Designs
